name: DYSTOPOLIS
description:
Take on a crime syndicate in a minimalistic cyberpunk metropolis using your ability to bend bullets.

DYSTOPOLIS is a short run n' gun shooter made by Dissonance Entertainment for the UC Davis GameCamp! 2016 game jam.

Controls

Mouse to aim, Left Mouse Button to fire, Right Mouse Button to use weapon special, WASD to move, Space to jump, ESC to quit.

Music

  • Jay Man - Last Push
  • Jay Man - Wide Web
